name: PocketNet.app Dark (CSharpner)
description: A dark theme for PocketNet.  All elements are now darkened.  If you find anything, OTHER THAN the circular graphs on the wallet page, please let me know.

user.name: csharpner
user.about:
I've been developing software my whole life.  Making themes is a new, side hobby of mine.  I prefer dark themes because they incur less strain on my eyes, drain less power from my mobile devices, and just plain look better (to me, anyway).

I accept donations via BitCoin:
bc1qdl3fflut4khf48umrrtxkmkug2vcvmmk3pd8n7

additional_info:
2019-11-29
---------------
- "Loading" box is no longer white (however, "Loading" text no longer visible).
- Notifications page text color
- Wallet graphs background darkened.

2019-10-16
---------------
- PocketNet deployed an update.  This fixes everything it broke:
   - Notifications menu.
   - Top nav bar.
   - Reputation Limitations.

2019-09-28
---------------
- Darkened the "Offline" popup. (footer can't be darkened because there's not CSS class on it and its name is dynamically generated on every page refresh).

2019-09-26
---------------
- Posts header nav control
- New article
- Publish ->
- "Do you really..." box
- Last Comments

2019-09-26
---------------
- Tags on right


2019-09-12
----------------
- Popup video player
- Link body text on posted links
- Icons on bottom left of your posts
- 3-dot menu on top-right of your full screen posts.
- Edit post background

2019-09-10b
-----------------
- fixed self-chat visibility.
- Bright Share link is dimmed.

2019-09-10
----------------
All elements of all pages are darkened now, with the one, known exception of circular graphs on the wallet page, which need to be colored with code, not CSS.

2019-09-09
----------------
The following pages are now darkened:
Edit Profile
All Posts
Your Pocket
Top Posts
Help Center
Bell Menu
My Posts
Followers
Following
Manage/Edit Profile
Darkened hashtag pills on new posts.
